text: Wolf Like Me is a streaming television drama miniseries. It was produced by Stan in association with NBCUniversal and Peacock. It premiered on both streaming services on 13 January 2022. ==Plot== Gary and Mary are in a new relationship but both have baggage. Gary is an emotional wreck and struggles to provide for his daughter since the death of his wife. Mary has a secret she can't bring herself to share with anyone. The universe brought these two together for a reason, they just need to keep following the signs. ==Cast== ===Main=== * Isla Fisher as Mary * Josh Gad as Gary * Ariel Donoghue as Emma ===Recurring=== * Emma Lung * Anthony Taufa ===Guest=== * Jake Ryan * Robyn Nevin * Nash Edgerton Category:2022 American television series debuts
title: Wolf Like Me
